name: 蔡德華
objective: 介紹材料通性、分類與應用，並深入高分子生成之聚合反應、反應機構、反應動力學、熱力學、聚合物之材料構造、聚合方法、分子量之測定、分子量分佈以及一般檢測高分子特性之技術。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Polymers
2. Polymer Structure (Morphology)
3. Molecular Weight of Polymers
4. Naturally Occurring Polymers
5. Step-Reaction Polymerization (Polycondensation Reactions)
6. Ionic Chain Reaction and Complex Coordination Polymerization (Addition Polymerization)
7. Free Radical Chain Polymerization (Addition Polymerization)
8. Copolymerization
9. Organometallic and Metalloid Polymers
10. Reactions of Polymers
scorePolicy: 出席上課情形，作業，課堂小考，實施月考、期中考、期末考。
materials: Charles E. Carraher, Jr., "Introduction to Polymer Chemistry", International 4th Edition, 2017.
consultation: 課程諮詢時間：星期一上午 9:10~12:00。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
